english.segment1: Well I could sing unending songs. Of how you saved my soul. & I could dance a thousand miles. Because of your great love
english.segment3: My heart is bursting Lord to. To tell of all you've done. Of how've you changed my life. And wiped away the past
english.segment4: Well, I want to shout it out. From every roof top sing. For now I know. That God is for me, not against me
english.segment5: I could sing unending songs. Of how you saved my soul. & I could dance a thousand miles. Because of your great love
english.segment6: My heart is bursting Lord to. To tell of all you've done. Of how've you changed my life. And wiped away the past
english.segment7: Well I want to shout it out. From every roof top sing. For now I know. That God is for me, not against me
english.segment8: Everybody's singin' now. Cuz we're so happy. Yeah, Everybody's dancin' now. Cuz we're so happy
english.segment9: If only I could see your face, See you smiling over us. And unseen angels celebrate. Hey! The joy is in this place. Yeah, The joy is in this place
english.segment10: I could sing unending songs. Of how you've saved my soul. & I could dance a thousand miles. Because of your great love. & I could sing unending songs. Of how you've saved my soul. & I could dance a thousand miles. Because of your great love
